宰.definition: to slaughter; to butcher; to kill (animals etc); (coll.) to fleece; to rip off; to overcharge; (bound form) to govern; to rule; (bound form) (a title for certain government officials in ancient China)

宰予.definition: Zai Yu (522-458 BC), disciple of Confucius

宰予晝寢.definition: Zai Yu sleeps by day (idiom); refers to story in Analects of Confucius remonstrating bitterly with his student for sleeping during lectures

宰人.definition: to overcharge; to rip sb off

宰割.definition: to slaughter; (fig.) to ride roughshod over; to take advantage of (others)

宰殺.definition: to slaughter (an animal for meat); to butcher

宰牲節.definition: see 古爾邦節|古尔邦节[Gu3 er3 bang1 jie2]
